Post.title: GitHub
Post._content:
### 1.hexo
#### 1.1 node.js
  node.jsnpmnpm

    npm -v
    node -v
#### 1.2 hexo

    npm install hexo-cli -g
    hexo -v

### 2. 
#### 2.1 
    hexo init Blog
    cd Blog
    npm install

#### 2.2 
    hexo clean
    hexo g      //  ggenerate
    
#### 2.3 
    hexo s      // sserver
 localhost:4000 

### 3.
_config.yml

* title
* subtitle
* description
* author
* language

language: default #

    # language: zh-CN
    # language: fr-FR
    # language: zh-HK
    # language: zh-TW
    # language: en
    # language: ru
    # language: de

****:

GitHub`Create a new repository`, `Repository name``.github.io`



    deploy:
          type: git
          repository: https://github.com/phepe/phepe.github.io
          branch: master
URL  git pages 

    url: https://phepe.github.io/

 hexo-deployer-git

    npm install hexo-deployer-git --save

GitHub

    hexo g        // 
    hexo s        // 
    hexo d        // ddeploy github
    
 https://phepe.github.io/ 

### 4. 
#### 4.1 


    hexo new "Tutorail"
source/_postsTutorail,

    hexo clean
    hexo g
    hexo s     // -p 9090   9090
 localhost:4000 

#### 4.2 
 source/_posts/.md

### 5. 
#### 5.1 
themesnext

    git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next
    
#### 5.2 
_config.ymltheme
    
    theme: next 
/theme/{theme}/_config.yml [](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html)`scheme` `language `
   
### 6.
#### 6.1 
* _config.yml `category_dir: categories`
* theme_config.yml `categories: /categories`

#### 6.2 
sourcecategories/index.md
    
    hexo new page categories
categories/index.md `type``comments`

    ---
    title: categories
    date: 2018-06-20 20:50:29
    type: "categories"
    comments: false
    ---
#### 6.3 
`categories`

    ---
    title: GitHub
    date: 2018-06-20 18:25:54
    categories: 
        - Git
    tags:
    ---
    
### 7.
#### 7.1 
* _config.yml `tag_dir: tags`
* theme_config.yml `tags: /tags`

#### 7.2 
sourcetags/index.md
    
    hexo new page tags
tags/index.md `type``comments`

    ---
    title: tags
    date: 2018-06-21 10:32:06
    type: "tags"
    comments: false
    ---
    
#### 7.3 
`tags `

    ---
    title: GitHub
    date: 2018-06-20 18:25:54
    categories: 
        - Git
    tags:
        - GitHub
    ---

### 8. 
#### 8.1 gitment

    npm install gitment --save
    
#### 8.2 Github

[Github](https://github.com/settings/applications/new)Client IDClient Secret 

    Application name : phepe
    Homepage URL : https://phepe.github.io/
    Application description : blog
    Authorization callback URL : https://phepe.github.io/
 
#### 8.3 Gitment

themes/next_config.yml, 

    gitment:
      enable: true
      github_user: phepe
      github_repo: phepe.github.io
      client_id: *******
      client_secret: *****

#### 8.4 

githubgithub

### 9. 

themes/next_config.yml`social`

    social:
      #GitHub: https://github.com/yourname || github
      E-Mail: mailto:phepe@foxmail.com || envelope
      #Google: https://plus.google.com/yourname || google
      #Twitter: https://twitter.com/yourname || twitter
      #FB Page: https://www.facebook.com/yourname || facebook
      #VK Group: https://vk.com/yourname || vk
      #StackOverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/yourname || stack-overflow
      #YouTube: https://youtube.com/yourname || youtube
      #Instagram: https://instagram.com/yourname || instagram
      #Skype: skype:yourname?call|chat || skype


### 10. git


`hexo d`gitblog`node_modules``npm install` node,`git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next` `Pu`
